about_the_game:
About the game:

Her Last Piece is a slow-burn, adult, gothic erotica bought you by SpiceMerchantsGames!

Her Last Piece is A striking choice based VN game with beautiful art and a mystery to unravel! Choose your path as you try to survive Arvenia's mind games! Will you stay focused on your escape? Or will you perhaps try to win her heart? Be careful though ... her possessive dark desires might lead to more than you bargained for!

We plan to sell Her Last Piece as three Acts! With the first of them releasing onto Early Access! We hope you enjoy it and remember..She lies.




Sent on a perilous mission by the kingdom of Luminarium to slay the dark queen Arvenia, you find yourself her prisoner, forced to work as her slave within the now derelict castle. You believe your life to be at its painful end, as you expect to toil away serving her every dark whim.

... But all is not as it seems, the dark queen lives alone within her towering fortress, and she isn’t who, or what, you were told she would be.

Can you unravel the mysteries of the dark queen? Who is she really? What does she want from you?

…And will you even live to tell the tale?

Whatever you choose, her majesty awaits...


  • Fully animated Live2D sprites
  • Fully animated adult scenes
  • Unlockable Gallery
  • High quality Original soundtrack
  • High quality voice acting
  • Fully Voiced Heroine
  • A very pattable Puppet
  • Two story branches

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains consensual sexual acts between the main character (the player) and the female main character. There can be some depictions of more forceful consensual scenes, depending on the choices the player makes. There is some alcohol usage present but in no circumstances does this lead to non-consensual sex.

  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6600 equivalent or higher performance (including AMD)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 or later
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
